ModMetaData.name: EVA Shredder Tech
ModMetaData.author: Cruel Moose
ModMetaData.description: Adds the EVA Shredder Rifle and EVA Shredder Turret, both firing suit-rupturing ammunition. Their bullets disrupt the self-seal systems in EVA suits, applying a stacking debuff that reduces vacuum resistance. Great for ship combat. Useless against mechanoids. Requires Odyssey and/or Save Our Ship 2!
